name: Arlong
effect:
[On K.O.] Up to 2 of your opponent’s rested cards will not become active in your opponent’s next Refresh Phase.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may give 1 of your opponent’s rested DON!! cards to 1 of your opponent’s Characters: give up to 1 DON!! card from their owner’s cost area and give it to their Leader or 1 of their Characters.
